title: Investigate bad blocks on devnet-6 and zhejiang-testnet

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

body:
https://forkmon.withdrawal-devnet-6.ethpandaops.com/
https://forkmon.zhejiang.ethpandaops.io/

Tasks that may solve or at least avoid this issue:
1. Fabio's PR to slow down freq of block building https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/5048
2. Cancel concurrent block building https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/5044
3. Don't report a bad block when we're invalidating our own block proposals

UPDATE: Cannot reproduce on main, only with this PR https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/5044

## How to reproduce 

Setup:

1. Build your local besu with `./gradlew installDist` and set the path to the binary in a `BESU` env, e.g. `export BESU=$HOME/IdeaProjects/besu/build/install/besu/bin/besu`
1. Clone https://github.com/siladu/beku-timestamp and switch to branch https://github.com/siladu/beku-timestamp/tree/withdrawals-devnet-x-recreate-badblock-at-355
1. In beku-timestamp, run `git submodule update --init --remote withdrawals-testnet`
1. Extract the zhejiang besu database synced to block 354, `besu-at-block-354.tar.gz` into your beku-timestamp directory
1. In another terminal, clone https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/tx-fuzz and switch to branch https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/tx-fuzz/tree/mutator and follow readme to prepare to run `./livefuzzer spam`


Reproduction steps:
1. Run this command to replace any existing db with the block 354 one and start besu `rm -rf /tmp/besu; cp -R besu-at-block-354 /tmp/besu; ./startBesu.sh zhejiang-testnet`
1. In another terminal in beku-timestamp, run `./debugBesu.sh` to enable relevant DEBUG logs
1. In another terminal in tx-fuzz run `./cmd/livefuzzer/livefuzzer spam` (you will get a nonce error but some txs will have made it).
1. In another terminal run `./recreateBug355.sh`
1. In your first terminal running besu, search for "Invalid block RLP"
1. May need to repeat reproductions steps a couple of times to recreate issue.

We are producing and invalidating our own bad blocks again. This time state root mismatch instead of receipts root mismatch...
